metadata.title: CVE-2019-11010 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20190322 Q8, there is a memory leak in thefunction ReadMPCImage of coders/mpc.c, which allows attackers to cause adenial of service via a crafted image file.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
